void doit()
{
	ll n,k;
	cin>>n>>k;
	if(k<n)
	{
		cout<<"0\n";
		return ;
	}
	ll extra=k-n;
	extra%=mod;
	ll kcn=1,ans=1;
	for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
	{
		kcn*=((k-i)%mod);
		kcn%=mod;
		//kcn*=inv(n-i);
		//kcn%=mod;
	}
	/*mdp.resize(n+2);
	for(int i=0;i<n+2;++i)
	{
		mdp[i].resize(3);
		for(int j=0;j<3;++j)
			mdp[i][j]=-1;
	}*/
	ll a1,a2,a3,b1,b2,b3;
	a1=extra;
	a2=extra;
	a3=(1+extra);
	for(int i=2;i<=n;++i)
	{
		b1=0;
		b2=0;
		b3=0;
		
		b1+=extra*a1;
		b1%=mod;
		b1+=((i-1)*a2)%mod;
		b1%=mod;

		b2+=extra*a1;
		b2%=mod;
		b2+=((i-1)*a3)%mod;
		b2%=mod;
	
		b3+=((1+extra)%mod)*a1;
		b3%=mod;
		b3+=((i-1)*a3)%mod;
		b3%=mod;
		
		a1=b1;
		a2=b2;
		a3=b3;
	}
	ans=a1;
	cout<<(kcn*ans)%mod<<endl;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		doit();
	}
	return 0;
}
